page.syntax: LockedOut_User_List as C = a5ws_Get_LockedOutUsers([C Format [,* NotUsed ]])

argument.name: LockedOut_User_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of userid values currently defined as locked out in web security.

argument.name: Format
argument.description: Optional. A display format information to use to output field information. Options are:"U" = Userid "T" = Logged out 'until time' as character Default is Userid only.

argument.name: NotUsed
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. It is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

page.description: Returns a crlf() delimited list of userid's currently locked out by the web security. Returns blank if no one is locked out. If a format is specified, returns output in that format (U=userid,T=untiltime as character).
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_LockedOutUsers() returns a CR-LF delimited list of user IDs currently locked out by the web security. Returns blank if no one is locked out. If a format is specified, returns output in that format. Request is added automatically by the server when run from a web page. An 'until time' of '01/01/9999 12:00:00 00 pm' will be returned if the security settings are set tol lock out a user until reset by an administrator. Limitations: Web applications only.
page.example: ?a5ws_Get_LockedOutUsers("U-T") = john at email.com-01/01/9999 12:00:00 00 pm sam at email.com-03/04/2011 08:37:58 73 pm

see.ref: Returns a CR-LF delimited list of userids currently locked out by the web security
